text: Demi치n Bichir N치jera (; born August 1, 1963) is a Mexican actor and one of the members of the Bichir family. After starring in telenovelas, he appeared in other Hollywood movies. He was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Actor for his performance in A Better Life. Bichir was born in Torre칩n, Coahuila. He is an American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) Ambassador for Immigration Rights. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Actors from Mexico City
